overview: Chet Kasedon is after the Indians hidden gold mine but Chief Moya will not reveal it's location. He has also hired mining engineers Gale and Mortimer to locate the mine. When Gale sees Kasedon's cruelty to Moya, he switches sides.
tagline: GREED For A Girl and Gold Proved To Be the Undoing of a Renegade!
title: Desert Gold
